name: Has
helpText: Has - Item: Shows the current contents of your inventory.

name: Get
helpText: Get - Item: Takes an item and places it into your inventory.

name: Go
helpText: Go : Direction: Moves you to the new direction

name: Talk
helpText: Talk - npc: Start a dialog with npc.

name: Replace
helpText: Replace - item:  Swap with existing item.
